SALES         Summary    I am clearly a loyal and friendly dedicated individual who has an ambition to succeed in any given environment. Although I have extensive experience in the Perishable Meats and seafood industry. I love to learn, and am always up to a challenge whatever the situation. I get along well with others, whilst also working efficiently on my own. I am seeking a position where I can develop and excel while giving my best to an employer. literate, Human Relations, Management Training, marketing, market, MS Excel, Microsoft Word, Persuasive, sales
personality:
Reading between the lines of this résumé, I can infer several personality traits and characteristics:

1. Stability & Loyalty
- Demonstrated through long tenures at companies (24 years at one company, 7 years at another)
- Uses words like "loyal" and "dedicated" in self-description

2. Achievement-Oriented
- Highlights multiple sales awards over different years
- Shows progression in career responsibilities
- Emphasizes success metrics and accomplishments

3. Traditional/Old School
- Career started in 1972
- Focus on traditional values like loyalty and dedication
- Writing style is conventional and straightforward

4. Adaptable
- Has kept up with technological changes (mentions computer skills despite starting career in pre-digital era)
- Shows willingness to learn new systems and adapt to change

5. Relationship-Focused
- Emphasizes interpersonal skills
- Mentions getting along well with others
- Has training in "Effective Human Relations"
- Career in sales suggests strong people skills

6. Detail-Oriented
- Keeps precise track of achievement dates
- Maintains balanced accounts
- Background in accounting and bookkeeping

7. Self-Motivated
- Long history of sales success
- Multiple mentions of working independently
- Demonstrated initiative in maintaining long-term client relationships

This appears to be someone who is reliable, traditionally-minded, relationship-oriented, and has a strong work ethic, though they might be somewhat conservative in their approach to work and business.
